attributes.action: fight the Leader of the Opposition, David Cameron, to the death before a public audience at Wembley Stadium, for the title of Supreme Overlord of the Isles of Albion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The time has come for decisive leadership in these times of economic crisis.

The only way this can be achieved in a satisfactory fashion is for the Prime Minister to engage in lethal combat against David Cameron.

The victor will be crowned Supreme Overlord of the Isles of Albion.

Weapons to be sand-filled leather clubs.

Mr Cameron must stand up to his waist in a pit, allowing the PM to circle freely.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
